resources.string: MUSIC GENRE MENU\n Here is the main menu of the app with music genre files provided in the music directory of the user\'s device. To access to these files we could use an URI with the MediaStore.Audio.Media class with getContentUri method.\n The user will download his own audio files in a dedicated folder. We use explicit intents to call each listed genre categories

ARTISTS LIST PER GENRE\n Here we can choose between some artists which belongs to the selected music genre. Each item are selectable and trigger an explicit intent which open the artist\'s song list activity
SONG LIST FROM SELECTED ARTIST CATEGORY\n Here we can choose between some song music. Each item are selectable and trigger an explicit intent which open the play song activity
SONGS FROM SELECTED ARTIST LIST\n Here we can play the song selected in the previous list of songs. The track will be managed by using MediaPlayer API with play(), pause() and stop() methods
